akas: The Trekyard Canada (English title) (original script title)
akas from release info: The Trekyard Canada (English title) (original script title)

1.title: NX Refit (Mission Briefing)
1.plot: Today we take a sneak peek at Doug Drexler's NX-01 Refit and discuss.

2.title: SS Botany Bay
2.plot: We take a look at the DY-100 class ship or many of you may know her the S.S. Botany Bay from "Space Seed". A very cool ship with a great history, several variants and is a major player in the history of the Federation and the future.

3.title: Vesta Class
3.plot: A lot of people have requested we take a look at this Star Trek Online beauty. So without further delay we present to you the Vesta Class.

4.title: Designing the Sovereign with John Eaves Part 1
4.plot: Well we are excited because we get to speak Mr. John Eaves about one of the best Star Trek hero ships out there, the USS Enterprise NCC-1701-E.

5.title: Negh'Var Class
5.plot: We look at the Klingon Negh'Var design from TNG, and DS9 today on Trekyards: Mission Briefings.

6.title: Designing the Sovereign with John Eaves Part 2
6.plot: Here is Part 2 of our chat with John Eaves about his iconic Enterprise E.

7.title: Building a 6 Foot Enterprise with Steve Neill
7.plot: Steve Neill joins us today to discuss his 6ft Enterprise build for the Museum of Science Fiction in Washington, D.C.

8.title: Tholian 1 Year Anniversary Special
8.plot: Its our 1 year anniversary today and to celebrate we are bringing you a special episode looking at the Tholians, not just their ships but also a brief history of their race.

9.title: USS Enterprise (JJVerse) Part 1
9.plot: We take a look at the JJprise in all its shiny big budget glory. We discuss the good and the bad and UGLY, and we hope you enjoy our take on it.

10.title: Klingon D6 Part 1 (Axanar Special)
10.plot: PART 1 - Lets take a look at the Klingon D6 of both Axanar and FASA fame. Alec Peters joins us as we examine the complete Star Trek history of this fantastic design.

11.title: USS Enterprise (JJVerse) Part 2
11.plot: Wwe take a look at the JJprise in all its shiny big budget glory. We discuss the good and the bad and UGLY, and we hope you enjoy our take on it.

12.title: Klingon D6 Part 2 (Axanar Special)
12.plot: Lets take a look at the Klingon D6 of both Axanar and FASA fame. We examine the complete Star Trek history of this fantastic design. Part 2.

13.title: Prometheus Class (Mission Briefing)
13.plot: Its time to divide our attention and take a mission briefing look at the USS Prometheus as first seen in the Voyager episode "Ship in a Bottle" Multi Vector Assault Mode anyone.

14.title: Centaur Class
14.plot: This is a fan requested ship from one of our Indiegogo supporters Mr. Jake Pelletier and he in fact joins us on the show to help present this ship to you all.

15.title: K7 Mission Briefing
15.plot: We visit K7 for some much needed shore leave in today's Mission Briefing.

16.title: USS Dauntless NX-01-A
16.plot: Looking at the Federation, but at the same time Alien craft the USS DAUNTLESS. We also have Rick Sternbach the designer of this truly unique ship joining us for this one guys.

17.title: Nebula Class (Mission Briefing)
17.plot: The Nebula class as seen all throughout Star Trek: TNG as well as Deep Space Nine. We are very much looking forward to doing a full Trekyards episode on this ship in the future. So sit back and lets take a look.

18.title: Ferengi D'kora Marauder
18.plot: We take a look at the Ferengi Marauder or D'Kora class starship from Star Trek: The Next Generation. A little seen and under used ship, with a very cool design story and some interesting tidbits as we learn from the designer himself, Mr. Andrew Probert.

0.title: Tholian Webspinner
0.plot: Our original pilot (Similar to Star Trek The Original Series first Pilot "The Cage") Was finished 12/9/2014. This episode was our first test of the Trekyards Formula. We take look at the Tholian Webspinner from The Original Series and Enterprise.

1.title: Romulan Warbird (TOS)
1.plot: In this first episode of TREKYARDS we take a look at the Romulan Bird of Prey as seen in the TOS episode "Balance of Terror". Also know as the Warbird or War Eagle. Enjoy. (Trekyards)

2.title: Phoenix Warp Ship
2.plot: In this episode we take a look at Zefram Cochrane's legendary Warp Ship the Phoenix as seen in Star Trek: First Contact. (Trekyards)

3.title: Miranda Class
3.plot: In this episode we take a look at the Miranda Class. Or as many of you may know her, The Reliant from Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan. (Trekyards)

4.title: Delta Flyer
4.plot: Takes a look at the Delta Flyer as seen in Star Trek: Voyager. Our first "shuttle" episode (Trekyards)

1.title: Klingon Bird of Prey: Part 1
1.plot: Here is the first part of a 3 part Legends series ship. This one being the Klingon Bird of Prey. A full length extended version with extra footage will be available after release. QAPLA'!!. (Trekyards: Legends)

2.title: Devore Warship
2.plot: The xenophobic race the Devore (From Voyager) and their cruisers are looked at in this, our first One Hit Wonders episode. (Trekyards: One Hit Wonders)

3.title: Maquis Raider
3.plot: We are feeling a little rebellious this episode, so lets head over to the badlands for this new episode as we examine the Maquis Raider, from TNG and Voyager. (Trekyards)

4.title: Transporter: Part 1
4.plot: In this, our very first TREKNOLOGY episode we look at one of Star Trek's most used and anticipated, pieces of technology. The Transporter. (Trekyards: Treknology)

5.title: Klingon Bird of Prey: Part 2
5.plot: Part 2 of our Klingon Bird of Prey Trekyards: Legends series. More facts, more fun and more us!(Trekyards: Legends)

6.title: Enterprise J: Part 1 (Drexler Special)
6.plot: We discuss one of NX-01 Designer Doug Drexler's designs, the Enterprise J seen Briefing in the Star Trek Enterprise episode "Azati Prime" and speculate about how the ship operated and performed. (Trekyards: One Hit Wonders)

7.title: TOS Dreadnought: Part 1
7.plot: This is one of our personal favorites, the Federation class Dreadnought.

8.title: Transporters: Part 2
8.plot: Part 2 of our episode on the Transporters. Extended version to be available after release. (Trekyards: Treknology)

9.title: Klingon Bird of Prey: Part 3
9.plot: The finally to our three part look at the Klingon Bird of Prey.

10.title: Enterprise J: Part 2 (Drexler Special)
10.plot: The conclusion of our look at the Enterprise J with designer Doug Drexler. Insights to be had once you move past your monkey brain.

11.title: TOS Dreadnought: Part 2
11.plot: Part two of the TOS Federation class Dreadnought (Trekyards)

12.title: Communicators: Part 1
12.plot: We examine the communication devices of the future. (Trekyards: Treknology)

1.title: Ares Class: Part 1 (Axanar Special)
1.plot: We take a pre-production look at the Ares cruiser from Prelude to Axanar, with our special guest Mr. Alec Peters. We give you the inside details about this ship and examine its place in the Star Trek Universe.

2.title: DS9 Design with Rick Sternbach
2.plot: This week we have a bonus episode where we take a look at the Cardassian space station Terok Nor, otherwise known as Deep Space 9 with its designer Rick Sternbach.

3.title: Bajoran Solar Sailor
3.plot: In this offering we examine the Ancient Bajoran Solar Sailor. We discuss it's many features, facts and flaws. A fun episode over all.

4.title: Galaxy Class Design with Andrew Probert
4.plot: In this episode we speak with Mr. Andrew Probert as he discusses the design process of the Galaxy class - USS Enterprise NCC-1701-D.

5.title: Suurok Class: Part 1 (Drexler Special)
5.plot: We look at the Vulcan Suurok class ship from Star Trek: Enterprise. We have Doug Drexler joining us for this episode as well, so sit back and enjoy some illogical human discussion on this very logical design.

6.title: Axanar D6 with Tobias Richter (Axanar Special)
6.plot: The CGI artist and designer of the Klingon D6 Tobias Richter talks to us about his creation for Axanar.

7.title: Communicators: Part 2
7.plot: It's time to wrap up our Treknology on the Communicators with part 2. Enjoy.

8.title: NX-01 Design with Doug Drexler (Drexler Special)
8.plot: In this episode we whet your appetite with a sneak peek at the NX-01 from Enterprise with its designer Doug Drexler joining us.

9.title: Ares Class: Part 2 (Axanar Special)
9.plot: Part 2 of our look at the Ares cruiser from Axanar with special guest Alec Peters.

10.title: Fasa/Starfleet Battles with Josh Spencer
10.plot: We speak with Josh Spencer, who has worked on Star Trek tabletop games Starfleet Battles and FASA role-playing systems. He is responsible for the SFB race the Interstellar Concordium and developed many other aspects, ships and weapons for both games.

11.title: SS Aurora
11.plot: In this episode we look at the original and the re-mastered versions of the SS Aurora as seen in the TOS episode "The Way to Eden"

12.title: Suurok Class: Part 2 (Drexler Special)
12.plot: Part 2 of the Vulcan Ship from Enterprise is ready to go with special guest Doug Drexler the designer of this great ship.

13.title: Doomsday Machine
13.plot: We take a look at the Planet Killer or Doomsday Machine as its called in this Treknology episode.

15.title: Ares Class: Part 3 (Axanar Special)
15.plot: Part 3 of the Ares class cruiser. Some fun stuff in this one as we do a versus with Alec Peters as well as Robert Burnett. So its' Captain Garth and Commander Burnett versus Captain Foley and Commander Cockings. Hope you guys enjoy it.

18.title: Romulan Terror Bird: Part 1
18.plot: The very first episode of Trekyards: Original. This episode features the original design known as the Romulan Terrorbird. This model was shown at Wonderfest 2015.

19.title: Romulan Terror Bird: Part 2
19.plot: Part 2 of the Romulan Terror Bird.

20.title: Brinok Class
20.plot: This is our first game specific ship episode. A Cardassian ship from Star Trek: Armada 2 called the Brinok class with guest Rick Sternbach joining us to give his point of view on this unique Cardassian ship.

21.title: Xindi Aquatic Cruiser
21.plot: The Xindi Aquatic Cruiser from Star Trek: Enterprise and again featured in Star Trek Online.

22.title: D7/K't'inga
22.plot: The very first episode of our new discussion based show called Trekyards: Mission Briefing. Unlike a regular episode of Trekyards, this show is unscripted and is just Samuel and Captain Foley discussing different aspects of a particular ship and theorizing as well as getting some insights and information for future FULL Trekyards episodes based on the ship in question.

23.title: Designing the 1701 Refit with Andrew Probert Part 1
23.plot: Well guys you have been asking for it and its finally here. A candid discussion on the designing of the most iconic starship in cinematic history, the refit Constitution class Enterprise from Star Trek: The Motion Picture with the very man that designed her, Mr. Andrew Probert. Now keep in mind this is a discussion on designing the ship. A full Trekyards Legends episode on this ship will be done and released next year to celebrate the 50 anniversary of Star Trek, so please stay tuned.

24.title: Oberth Class
24.plot: We look at the Oberth class, or as some of you may know her, the USS Grissom from Star Trek 3.

1.title: Designing the 1701 Refit with Andrew Probert Part 2
1.plot: Part 2 of designing the Enterprise Refit with Andrew Probert. So many cool things to learn.

2.title: Romulan D'deridex
2.plot: We take a look at the very popular Romulan D'deridex class ship as it appears in Star Trek:The Next Generation.

3.title: Ships of Axanar - Axanar Special
3.plot: In this special we take a brief look at a few of the ships of Axanar, with Mr. Alec Peters himself.

4.title: Galaxy X -Galaxy Class Refit
4.plot: We discus the Galaxy X refit from All Good Things in today's mission briefing.

5.title: Enterprise B with John Eaves Part 1
5.plot: We speak with the elusive John Eaves about one of his early creations the Enterprise B as seen in Star Trek: Generations. One of our favorite Star Trek designers to speak with.

6.title: Ptolomey Class
6.plot: This week we take a look at the TOS Tug or Ptolomey Class.

9.title: Designing Icarus with Scott Nakada (Renegades Special)
9.plot: With the premiere of Renegades later today in Los Angeles we proudly bring you a special episode on one of the Starship stars of that show. We spotlight the Icarus for you with special guest Scott Nakada.

10.title: Enterprise D Bridge with Larry Nemecek
10.plot: Our first Special Guest star Mission Briefing....we talk to Dr. Trek, Mr. Larry Nemecek and pick his his brain about all the interesting stories behind the TNG bridge. And don't worry, many more special guest briefings on the way.

11.title: Cage Constitution Class
11.plot: Trekyards brings you the Constitution class as first seen in the Star Trek pilot "The Cage".

12.title: Production Constitution Class
12.plot: Today we examine the production version we all know and love from the 3 seasons of Star Trek TOS. We proudly present, to you NCC-1701.

13.title: Phase 2 Constitution Class
13.plot: Looking at the unused Phase 2 Enterprise, that was to grace our screens in a brand new television series back the late 1970's. The project was dropped in favor of a big budget motion picture and a new Enterprise.

14.title: Refit Constitution Class
14.plot: Today's episode takes a look at, probably the most iconic starship in cinematic history. The Enterprise refit as seen in Star Trek: The Motion Picture and the other original crew movies. Enjoy this look at a truly inspiring piece of art.

15.title: Saber Class
15.plot: This is a fan requested episode from Aaron B. Walsh. He was kind enough to donate to our Indiegogo campaign and his perk was to request a ship for us to do an episode on, well here it is Aaron. Trekyards proudly presents the Saber Class.

16.title: Borg Cube
16.plot: Resistance is Futile today as we will be looking at a very imposing ship (or shape), the Borg cube.

17.title: Whale Probe
17.plot: A mysterious probe approaches Earth disabling ships and causing devastation in its wake. Wonder what we can learn about it.

18.title: Romulan Valdore
18.plot: We take a look at the Romulan Valdore class as seen in Star Trek: Nemesis.

19.title: Designing Icarus with Scott Nakada Part 2
19.plot: Part 2 of our designing the Icarus with Scott Nakada.

20.title: Andrew Probert on the Galaxy X
20.plot: We ask the designer of the Galaxy class Enterprise Andrew Probert for his thoughts on how the Galaxy X looks in the TNG episode "All Good Things..." and just what exactly did they do to his beautiful design.

21.title: Lexxa and Icarus with Adrienne Wilkinson
21.plot: We talk with Adrienne Wilkinson who played Lexxa Singh in the independent feature Star Trek: Renegades. She talks about her character and her ship the Icarus.

-1.title: Jacqueline Kim Enterprise B Interview
-1.plot: Samuel speaks with the helmsman (or helmslady) of the Enterprise B, a very interesting lady with some great insights. Jacqueline Kim at the London Film and Comic Convention 2015.

imdb.plot outline: In this weekly released web series, we examine the ships and technology of the Star Trek Universe. We go in depth and are attempting to be the definitive go to place for all you trek based knowledge. We wish to spark new ideas and expand on the ever growing Star Trek mythos and encourage our viewers to share their knowledge by way of the comments section. We research each episode completely and endeavor to let you know all the canon and no-canon facts about the hardware from the Trek universe that you all love. But despite our best efforts, we may miss something or make the occasional error. So we encourage all who watch to add anything they feel is important. We have an expert panel of designers and special guests that have designed some of the most iconic ships as seen on screen and even visit the future as we talk with the men and women behind the up and coming Trek as well as the old timers. So join us on a weekly voyage as we boldly go, where no web series has gone before.
imdb.title: Trekyards
plot: In this weekly released web series, we examine the ships and technology of the Star Trek Universe. We go in depth and are attempting to be the definitive go to place for all you trek based knowledge. We wish to spark new ideas and expand on the ever growing Star Trek mythos and encourage our viewers to share their knowledge by way of the comments section. We research each episode completely and endeavor to let you know all the canon and no-canon facts about the hardware from the Trek universe that you all love. But despite our best efforts, we may miss something or make the occasional error. So we encourage all who watch to add anything they feel is important. We have an expert panel of designers and special guests that have designed some of the most iconic ships as seen on screen and even visit the future as we talk with the men and women behind the up and coming Trek as well as the old timers. So join us on a weekly voyage as we boldly go, where no web series has gone before.::Stuart Foley
